item.title: Listen: Appeals court skeptical of Trump tariff authority
item.description: Trump's reciprocal tariffs and trafficking-related duties were preivously struck down by a federal trade court, but that decision was put on pause.

item.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent says 'we have the makings of a deal' with China
Woman pleads guilty in $30M scam that sold access to Trump fundraiser, fake U.S. residency
item.description: More than 150 people, many foreign nationals from China, were duped into investments in hopes of winning legal residency in the United States.

item.title: Trump slaps universal 50% tariff on copper imports; metal's price plunges
item.description: The Trump administration says that the tariffs on metals imports are aimed at boosting domestic industries and addressing "trade imbalances."

item.title: U.S. sanctions Brazilian judge targeted by Trump over Bolsonaro case
item.description: Shortly after those sanctions were announced, Trump imposed a 50% tariff on imports from Brazil, with a statement from the White House referencing the...
